attributes.action: to ensure that self employed people are treated the same as people employed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
when someone who is employed is signed off work by their doctor, the employer accepts the sick note from the doctor and pays full sick pay for 28 weeks.
A self employed person gets a certificate from the doctor and claims ESA and then is sent for a medical by a non specialist  doctor who asseses the person for work. If this assesment shows the poerson in the doctors opinion is "fit for work" ESA stops.
Do DWP not trust GPs and Specialists within the NHS
